ACTION_NOT_IMPLEMENTED: We're sorry, but that action has not yet been implemented.
AT_TOP_OF_INVENTORY_TREE: You are at the top of the inventory tree.
CHOOSE_ITEM_FIRST: Please choose the item to $0 first.
CHOOSE_ITEM_OR_DIRECTION: Please choose an item or direction for $0.
CHOOSE_ITEMS_FIRST: Please choose the item(s) to $0 first.
CHOOSE_TWO_ITEMS_FIRST: Please choose the two items to $0 first.
CHOOSE_ONLY_ONE_AT_A_TIME: You can only $0 one item at a time.
CHOOSE_EXACTLY_TWO_AT_A_TIME: You must select exactly two items to $0.
QUANTITY_SUBTRACT_NEED_ONE_THING_SELECTE: You can only have one thing selected when choosing a quantity.
QUANTITY_SUBTRACT_NEED_SOMETHING_SELECTE: You have to have something selected before you can choose a quantity.
QUIT_MSG: Press CTRL-ALT-Q to quit the game.
